here is a mob you can add crabs and hermit crabs to Minecraft the crab would live on the beach if it was a land crab and can be pout in a bucket same with the hermit crab. and water crab can swim away but it will get tired if it dose and would stop moving for 5 scents and can also be pout in a bucket but if sea crabs don't have water they will start to get slow and after 2 minute it would die. but a sea hermit crab would just sit and hope you leave and if you do it will start moving again when you are 5 blocks away but if you sit there and don't leave it will come out after  1 minute it would come out of its shell and look around and then you can catch it.

This really needs to be fixed. It's been unresolved and present in every version of the game since 2018.

https://bugs.mojang.com/browse/MC-132473 

It's funny because squids flying and dying was a bug that people liked to talk about being fixed before Minecraft was even officially released, yet squids are constantly dying yet again so many years later.
Mojang please fix this. Glow squids are cool but I never get to see them, they're always dead the instant they spawn.

Normal squids are cool but they never stick around long either.

this mob feels like a great way to add life and soul to the End, perhaps instead of it having tassels it has a sort of spider legs, that allow it to scurry and jump. Maybe it only spawns on the small islands around the end city and around it. Another cool feature to think about is maybe it attacks Shulkers and creates a little Movement and action in the end that‚Äôs not entirely you? And maybe it drops a load of experience and maybe rare items to congratulate you on hunting it, maybe even an achievement. That may be going too far but great idea keep expanding on it

A big thing that the developers are trying to achieve is for no event to happen without players' control over. I feel that being pulled in / pushed away in the end would need a way to prevent this from happening. Maybe some kind of item or armour piece to negate the effects of this mob?

Some suggestions for Enderwolves: Immune to void damage

Actively hunts Endermen and Endermites.

Black/Dark Gray/Purple fur ( I seriously don't know.)

Spawns in packs.

When exposed to Chorus Fruit, they tp over, start biting the stalk until it breaks, and bring the fruit to the pack.

Unique behavior: They save one piece of chorus fruit, then replant it.

Again, these are just suggestions, feel free to modify/use/ not use at all!
